content: Phase 0: Update ResultStruct macro to detect and handle warning field generation
Run cargo build after macro changes and fix any compilation errors
Phase 1: Add generate_format_warning helper function to handler.rs
Run cargo build and verify helper function compiles
Phase 2: Create SpawnFormatError struct in bevy_spawn.rs
Phase 2: Create InsertFormatError struct in bevy_insert.rs
Phase 2: Create MutateComponentFormatError struct in bevy_mutate_component.rs
Phase 2: Create MutateResourceFormatError struct in bevy_mutate_resource.rs
Phase 2: Create InsertResourceFormatError struct in bevy_insert_resource.rs
Run cargo build and verify all error structs compile with ResultStruct derive
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues following warning rules
Phase 2: Add create_format_discovery_error helper function to handler.rs
Run cargo build and verify helper compiles
Phase 3: Add warning field to SpawnResult struct
Phase 3: Add warning field to InsertResult struct
Phase 3: Add warning field to MutateComponentResult struct
Phase 3: Add warning field to MutateResourceResult struct
Phase 3: Add warning field to InsertResourceResult struct
Run cargo build and verify all warning fields compile correctly
Phase 4: Update execute_static_brp_call error handling in handler.rs to use create_format_discovery_error
Run cargo build and fix any type errors in handler
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues following warning rules
Phase 5: Update corrections.md test - change error expectations to error_info
Phase 5: Update corrections.md test - add warning field verification for successes
Phase 5: Update format_discovery.md test - change to error_info expectations
Phase 5: Update format_discovery.md test - add warning verification
Phase 5: Update no_plugin.md test - change metadata to error_info
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only)
Review suggestions with user
